awd_abstract_narration: University of Kansas-Main Campus is being supported to                          establish a Research Experiences for Undergraduates (REU) SITE.                 The purpose of this SITE is to provide meaningful hands-on                      research opportunities in contemporary chemistry for                            outstanding undergraduate students under the supervision of                     experienced research chemists.                                                                                                                                  For the summer of 1988, the program will support 8 students                     recruited from Kansas and other institutions.                                                                                                                   Research activities will include studies in the following areas:                                                                                                   o Bioanalytical chemistry                                                       o Analytical chemistry                                                          o Inorganic chemistry                                                           o Organic chemistry                                                             o Physical chemistry
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences

pgm_ref.pgm_ref_txt: REU SITE-Res Exp for Ugrd Site
